update t_enterprise_auth set company_name = #{companyName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, license = #{license,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, organization = #{organization,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, activated = #{activated,jdbcType=INTEGER}, deleted = #{deleted,jdbcType=INTEGER}, created_date = #{createdDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, updated_date = #{updatedDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where enterprise_auth_id = #{enterpriseAuthId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: SELECT a.*, u.mobile FROM t_enterprise_auth a, t_user u where u.user_id = a.user_id and a.enterprise_auth_id=#{authId}
